text: Superb&pointed column by KaranThapar about how the Yaqoob-Amrit story, of the compassion of a Muslim Indian to his dying Hindu friend, is a model worth hailing of India's essential insaniyat amid #COVID19: https://t.co/nm59un9L0w Will @PMOIndia praise this in the next #ManKiBaat?
